is alot?  Wait until Frank and Chris do their upcoming project together.  C=
hris will be able to claim to be a co-creator of the technology.


        =
--- On Wed, 5/27/09, SnowfireL@... <SnowfireL@...> wrote:


       =
   From: SnowfireL@... <SnowfireL@...>
          Subject: [EVP-ITC]=
 Here we go again,
          To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, RTSC@yahoogroups.=
com, inside_the_box_rtsc_talk_radio@yahoogroups.com
          Date: Wednesd=
ay, May 27, 2009, 5:22 PM



          This is the primary reason Frank, St=
eve and Bruce need to kiss and make up, otherwise... ...well, you all see w=
hat is happening now..  Someone else is reaping the rewards, and taking all=
 the credit for all you guys hard earned work. 


          "TONIGHT on Hau=
nted Times Magazine Radio... 
          Current mood:  blessed
          Ca=
tegory: Dreams and the Supernatural 
          Tonight, Christopher Moon wi=
ll talk about the Telephone to the Dead, including discussing how he became=
 the fortunate primary researcher of it since it's modern day inception, hi=
s research into it and with it, and the controversy which stems from it.

 =
         As an added bonus, guests will have the opportunity to call in and=
 attempt to contact loved ones on the other side through Chris and the Tele=
phone to the Dead.

          As always, our show begins tonight at 9:00pm =
EST / 8:00pm CST / 7:00pm MST / 6:00pm PST on www.blogtalkradio. com/haunte=
dtimes magazine."
